title: My account got deleted
body: my account got completely erased...I had an account with multiple champions purchased using REAL money... had stopped playing for a few months because of school. and when I try and login again it didnt recognize my login, so I asked for my info via email etc, this was the only account that showed up. It had no purchased champions on it, and was summoner level 1.... I spent over 200$ and the funny thing is I have proof that that account was linked to the email that my new league account is linked too

replies.body:
The only way (that I know of) accounts get deleted is when it is specifically requested by the owner. If you know the summoner name of the account you might be able to put through an account recovery ticket with support, though you will need to remember details unique to the account to do this.

It's possible the account was compromised, honestly not sure what to tell you other than support is your best bet for more info here.
Wait so how do I set up a support ticket

Sorry I assumed that was how you got the info you had.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
